## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b8a81b4ba3171a1363b7516e3d29ec3fbce2f7dbc047fe89563e20757645d7fe)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.google.play.appupdate' @ 2.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
